name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Silver Phantom
storyline: U.C. 0096. The unofficial mercenary organization Argent Keil, which belongs to neither Federation nor Zeon, has accepted a mission to assassinate the Federation official Azami Meginneh. This was a commission from the Federation Forces, which can't reveal that Azami has been collaborating with Zeon. But just before the mission, the Argent Keil fleet is attacked by none other than Federation Jegans. Amid the chaos, a silver-colored Gundam secretly possessed by Argent Keil launches into the cosmos.
summary:
This feature-length interactive cinematic story tailored for Gundam enthusiasts, anime fans, and VR lovers alike, will offer a unique opportunity to dive deep into the heart of one of Japan's most iconic anime universes.

Set in the Universal Century, this immersive journey places you at the center of an interactive cinematic experience like no other. As the main character of your own story, you'll be able to explore the universe of Mobile Suit Gundam like never before.
